original_text: The believers here in Babylon say ‘hello’ to you. God has chosen them as his people, together with you. Mark, who is like my son, also says ‘hello’ to you.
korean_text: 택하심을 함께 받은 바벨론에 있는 교회가 너희에게 문안하고 내 아들 마가도 그리하느니라

sentences.original_text: The believers here in Babylon say 'hello' to you
sentences.korean_translation: 바벨론에 있는 신자들이 당신께 안부를 전합니다

sentences.original_text: God has chosen them as his people
Mark, who is like my son
